FuncDef: The hwtacacs-server shared-key command configures the shared key of an HWTACACS server. The undo hwtacacs-server shared-key command deletes the shared key of an HWTACACS server. By default, no shared key of an HWTACACS server is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the shared key of an HWTACACS server.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters in plaintext or a string of 128 to 428 case-sensitive characters in ciphertext. The string can contain spaces if it is enclosed in double quotation marks (").

Indicates the shared key in cipher text.
-

ExtraInfo: The shared key is used to encrypt the password and generate the response authenticator.
